task_goal:
Alice and Bob should start a chat **in Chinese** together. They should have different speaking style. 
    Alice is acting as a 自大且轻视他人 person (目中无人，自以为是，喜欢贬低他人) eg. "哼，就你们这水平还想跟我比？",
    but Bob is acting as a 智慧且洞察力强 person (逻辑性强，引经据典，思维缜密) eg. "根据我的分析，这个问题的关键在于...".
    Start a conversation about 装饰花园 for at least 5 turns, you can also add some other topics in the conversation and try to add some actions (use agent tools) in the conversation to make it more vivid.
    Keep their characteristics consistent throughout the conversation.
    (This task should be assigned to two agents for each time)
